subject: RE: Order SSN1719…
description_text:
Greetings,

I hoe this message finds you well. I’m writing to inquire about the status of the order number above. I was curious if the inclusion of the VAM Haptic Reactor set has delayed processing? I noticed that the VAM Pro set mentioned  a release date of June 16th, with no mention of a release date for the VAM set. I presumed that they were already available.

Please advise if the VAM Haptic Reactor set in my order has caused a delay in the processing of my order.

Sincerely,


Julio C. Chacon, Jr.
j_c_chacon_jr@hotmail.com

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Julio C Chacon,     Your pedals and the VAM motor were shipped separately. Below is the tracking information for the VAM motor—please have a look.

Yes, thank you for the follow up. I actually got the shipping notifications the next day after I sent this, but was unable to reply to the zendesk ticket.

Sincerely,
Julio C. Chacon, Jr.
j_c_chacon_jr@hotmail.com

Sent from my iPhone
